list.abs: Her uncle was a silent , uncommunicative Yankee farmer ., 她伯父是一个沉默寡言的美国式农民.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... mum adj 沉默的，无言的 | uncommunicative a 拘礼的,沉默寡言的 reserved adj． 说话不多的.
of an uncommunicative and eccentric disposition性情孤僻
Gradually , I became uncommunicative and reserved., 渐渐地我变得孤僻 , 不苟言笑.
